cards.html:
Hello {first_name, "there"},

It's allegedly mid-week, but who knows what day it is any more?

I don't know about you, but I'm having to actively isolate myself from Twitter, because what's developing in the US is almost compulsive viewing. It feels almost bizarre to be writing newsletters like this with the background of journalists being aggressively targeted by the police in a major western democracy. But, I need to keep reminding myself, one of the responses open to us is get better at doing what we do. Hopefully today's digest will help you with that.

Stay safe, my friends.

"Figure out what Civil is actually doing" has been sitting there for over a year, and perhaps that was the heart of the problem. When someone with 15 years of interest in journalism innovation can't quite figure out - or isn't inspired to understand - what you're doing, how are you going to get the word out?
